title: Athletism — Polo (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Technical Reset
equipment: Swimming pool (deep water, water polo goals, balls, caps)
Dryland: gym (rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, kettlebells)
goal: Restore base aerobic fitness, mobility, and technical efficiency in water skills.

warmup: Water drills: sculling, vertical kick easy 5'
main: Dryland: Back Squat 4x6, Pull‑ups 4x8, Landmine press 4x8

notes: Week 1: 2x swim Z2 30–40'. Week 2: +10% volume, add eccentrics on dryland.
